00012 // These flags tells us which items should be auto-calculated for this
00013 // class

00018       Weapon            = 0x00001,

00048   struct CLDTstruct
00049   {
00050     int attribute[2];   // Attributes that get class bonus
00051     int specialization; // 0 = Combat, 1 = Magic, 2 = Stealth
00052     int skills[5][2];   // Minor and major skills.
00053     int isPlayable;     // 0x0001 - Playable class
00054 
00055     // I have no idea how to autocalculate these items...
00056     int calc;
00057   }; // 60 bytes
00058 
00059   std::string name, description;
00060   CLDTstruct data;
00061 
00062   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00063     {
00064       name = esm.getHNString("FNAM");
00065       esm.getHNT(data, "CLDT", 60);
00066 
00067       if(data.isPlayable > 1)
00068         esm.fail("Unknown bool value");
00069 
00070       description = esm.getHNOString("DESC");
00071     }
